comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110314 Firefox/4.0b13pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110314 Firefox/4.0b13pre

For example, links received in e-mail messages, don't open in the browser. Have to copy/paste them manually.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Copy
2.Paste in browser address line.
3.
Actual Results:  
Link works.

Expected Results:  
Build-in hyperlink support.

I use Minefield on Ubuntu 10.10 Great browser.
